import React from "react" import { AdaptivityProvider, ConfigProvider, useAdaptivity, AppRoot, SplitLayout, SplitCol, ViewWidth, View, Panel, PanelHeader, Header, Group, SimpleCell, withAdaptivity, CellButton, PopoutWrapper, ModalDismissButton, Button, Div, Title } from "@vkontakte/vkui"; import "@vkontakte/vkui/dist/vkui.css"; function App() { const { viewWidth } = useAdaptivity(); const [popout, setPopout] = React.useState(null); const [todos, setTodos] = React.useState([ {id: 1, completed: true}, {id: 2, completed: false}, {id: 3, completed: false}, {id: 4, completed: false}, {id: 5, completed: false}, {id: 6, completed: false}, {id: 7, completed: false}, {id: 8, completed: false} ]) const styles = { but: { textAlign: 'center', align: 'center' }, title: { marginTop: '5px', marginBottom: '5px', textAlign: 'center' }, gr: { margin: '0 auto 0 auto' } } function button1 () { } function button2 () { } //return return ( Бит-фонарик { todos[0].completed === false ?
:
}
); } export default App;
